mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO memberNo, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PWD memberPwd, MEMBER_NAME memberName, TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birthday, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, STATUS, PRIVILEGE, LOCATION_NAME locationName FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_LOCATION ON(LOCAL_CODE = LOCATION_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT GENRE_NAME genreName FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBERGENRE ON(MEMBER_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_GENRE USING(GENRE_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBERGENRE VALUES( SEQ_MEMNO.CURRVAL, (SELECT GENRE_CODE FROM TB_GENRE WHERE GENRE_NAME = #{genreName}))
